Uses of Interface
peregrine.util.Lifecycle

Packages that use Lifecycle
peregrine.controller Main interface for the controller which allows one to kick off and execute jobs in the cluster. 
peregrine.http A new and cleaner HTTP client that doesn't require an extra queue and uses isWritable correctly. 
peregrine.util.netty Extensions and additional code for using Netty and async IO. 
peregrine.worker Worker daemon including PFS (partitioned filesystem) support as well as main daemon interface (RPC, etc). 
 

Uses of Lifecycle in peregrine.controller
 

Classes in peregrine.controller that implement Lifecycle
 class ControllerDaemon
          Basic daemon for running the controller only (no FS operations).
 

Uses of Lifecycle in peregrine.http
 

Classes in peregrine.http that implement Lifecycle
 class HttpClientRuntime
          Backend runtime for the HTTP client including netty bootstrap and Executors.
 

Uses of Lifecycle in peregrine.util.netty
 

Classes in peregrine.util.netty that implement Lifecycle
 class BaseDaemon
          Provides general services and infrastructure for peregrine daemons (worker and controller).
 

Uses of Lifecycle in peregrine.worker
 

Classes in peregrine.worker that implement Lifecycle
 class WorkerDaemon
          Main daemon for handling filesystem operations.
